import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import "./navbar.css" import {AiOutlineBell, AiOutlineMenu, AiOutlineMessage, AiOutlineSearch} from "react-icons/ai" import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom' const Navbar = () => { const [active, setActive] = useState(false) const {pathname} = useLocation(); const [openmenu, setOpenMenu] = useState(false) const isActive = () =>{ window.scrollY > 0 ? setActive(true ) : setActive(false) } useEffect(()=>{ window.addEventListener('scroll',isActive) return () =>{ window.removeEventListener('scroll',isActive) } },[]) return (
setOpenMenu(!openmenu)}/> { openmenu &&
